mapper.select: SELECT id, split_id, order_id, commodity_id, commodity_sepc, commodity_qty, order_ctns, done_ctns, services, descr, inner_org_id FROM in_order_commodity where id = #{id}
SELECT id, split_id, order_id, commodity_id, commodity_sepc, commodity_qty, order_ctns, done_ctns, services, descr, inner_org_id FROM in_order_commodity where 1 = 1
